title: I feel sorry for Zed players with recent news
body:
Even if Zed is not doing that well he will likely be perma banned because people will just think of random champs to ban that they find annoying and Zed will likely be among the first.

Riot please don't add proactive bans and instead add some reactive ones to try and screw up the enemy team comp.

replies.body: Why would you feel sorry for Zed mains? Zed isn't overpowered but is bullshit. There's a reason people like to ban champions like Zed, Yasuo, Riven and Ekko and it has to do with not having fun for the first twenty minutes of the game. I'll just try to take this cs.. fuck manaless shuriken on a 6s cd.

I remember when the Mana Item Rework stuff came around at first. "Mages should have to pay costs and have a finite amount of spells". There were a whole lot of essence reaver and "meanwhile, Zed" jokes passed around.
what news?
Riot is most likely gonna add more bans during next preseason. It could increase to 10.
And literally everyone that doesnt one trick pony the Cancer Championsâ„¢ cheered in delight and hope that the game is actually improving for once.

How are we defining "cancer champions"? Because I'm mostly an OTP (though I can play moderately well with lots of them), and people would call my champion cancer a lot of the time, but I'm 'presuming' you mean either FotM or Yasuo/Ekko/Zed/etc instead of me.

More FotMs, cancer assassins and bruiserassassins OTPs that OTPs in general, yeah.

If you OTP something like, idk, Karthus, that is no problem.
no, they said they will look into _after_ preseason, so mid season 7 at earliest.

Finally

I mean seriously, there are over 130 champions now.
So if 10 bans are made then 90-95% of the roster is still remaining.

Zed, Fizz, Riven

10 bans are way way way too many

10 bans before anything is pick is too many.

If a couple bans were added into the system where 6 champs have been picked and then another 2 are banned on each side that would work.

http://dota2.gamepedia.com/Game_modes

I am speaking of something like Captian's mode.
the problem with that is it takes _forever_.
Have some god damn patience. That way for banning is way better and actually allows for some diversity, instead of people just insta-banning the same broken as fuck shit every single time.

nah, they're now gonna ban more broken-as-fuck-shit
because that's how much there is
Touche.
and this change is any different how?

I can see why you are concerned

Irelia bot OTP xd 


No 5 banns per team is fine increase your champion pools people

This is coming from a guy who mains le bl riven... one of the most hated champs
RIP riven not being banned.
Depends... if she continues to be buffed because she isnt the Cancer Queen of non-LCS ranked, she will be banned a lot more.

People have been banning what is annoying ever since they saw the ban option and yes you are right zed unless his rework makes him garbage he will be perma banned. He's just on that list of champs people feel are complete cancer to play against yes he's balanced and isn't that bad but people hate assassin's by nature. Anything that can kill you before you can react or just gives people's comfort picks a hard time. 

Personally I believe the bans are gonna go 

Zed
Kled
Fizz
Yasuo 
(Insert op junglers here) 
(Insert op junglers here) 
Riven 
Rengar(depends on rework)
Malzahar  (he's hated) 
Most likely ekko or something that is extremely broken at the time 

And in tournaments they are just gonna target ban key players or roles until nothing is left

> And in tournaments they are just gonna target ban key players or roles until nothing is left

I look forward to the day when three marksmen get banned in an LCS draft, and then neither team knows what to do because that's all there ever is in the marksman champion pool in pro play.
That will be a glorious day. I'm personally looking forwards to the "let's ban 5/10 of the same role" shenanigans.
Same for junglers

I already know who im banning, Kled Hecarim Zed Fizz (these two because they are just annoying and there is no more QSS, and they are too much a struggle if they get out of hand, and I cant trust teammates to not die to them in lane) and Malz Rengar and GP if they are up. Boom my bans

Malz isnt even worth it as of late. All he has its his passive and a bunch of overnerfed and contitional damage. His Q and E are worthless atm as damage because you have to max W first because otherwise you do no damage.
I'd rather lane against a Zed than a Yasuo any day.

Ekko
Le Blanc
Fizz
Yasuo
Yi
Tahm Kench
Illaoi
Rengar
Fiora
Rumble

10 bans comes pretty close to banning all the cancerous champs. I hope they go through with it.

>Yi
>Tahm Kench
>Rumble

No one is going to ban Yi, Tahm or Rumble... they are all gutted or out of meta.
Its my personal cancer list, those champs aren't necesarily strong. Just annoying as fuck.
Nah, Rumble and Tahm are viable and have been picked in LCS too.
Yeah but they are _nowhere_ banworthy.
Ran a full mr page into rumble, 70 mr at lvl 1 his flamespitter still did half my health. Fuck dealing with that piece of shit.

He cant even empower his flamethrower at level 1. 

The scenario you describe is extremely unlikely bordering on false, unless you also tanked the minions' AAs, which at level 1 hurt a lot.
Nope I did tank it for its full duration just to see how much damage it would do with such a page. Mind you I was playing Shen who doesn't have a lot of health.
Your list makes no sense lol. Rumble?? Yi??? Yi isn't even good right now. Kench???? Kench is more of a support champ. than ever before and does just what he should. Idk much about the others.
Yi is only cancerous when you have bad teammates, cause once hes got a couple of kills the right clicking train begins. Noone will try to cc, or pick champs with cc.
Hopefully that champ never makes it into play again. BS champs should stay forgotten.

People either ban what they don't like or what they think is strong. Zed had a period where it was both. He may not be as strong now but people probably still don't enjoy playing against him. And should bans increase I'd imagine more assassins being added along with him.
Whatever, zed will get a rework, you never know he might be garbage

Why should he? 
Zed has a great kit, good synergy, clear strengths and weaknesses.
Zed is one of Riot's favorite LC$ poster childs. He wont be garbage. I can even say that his rework will be utmost priority for Riot.
Except zed doesn't get played in the lcs, has the 4th lowest win rate in mid lane and isn't getting reworked.  Damn that is actually the most incorrect sentence i've read in a long time.

I mean LC_**$**_ not actual LCS.

Zed is still the posterboy for Muh Madskillz Plehsâ„¢, even if he isnt a contested pick on actual LCS. His skins, iirc, are still amongst the higher selling ones.
And despite all that he still only has 2 available skins.  You are trying too hard to put a bad title on Zed, you should just stop while you are ahead.
Yes, because you, UrZedM8, are completly unbiased about Zed.

You do realize that everything I've said has been facts, while everything you have said has been negative opinions.  If there is anything I've said that isn't true you can always tell me what it is so I can just prove you wrong again.  You are really trying too hard.
Even if Zed were the weakest champ in the game I would ban him, why? Because playing against pure cancer isn't fun.
Im more scared of insane long pick/ban phase.. it already takes fucking forever.

> [{quoted}](name=PiVoRx,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=B2W5Umyg,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-08-21T13:15:51.963+0000)
>
> Im more scared of insane long pick/ban phase.. it already takes fucking forever.

they mentioned ways to speed it up, aka your whole team getting to ban people at the same time, instead of taking turns
